pr_title: CATROID-691: user language sensor for locale

timeline.message:
CATROID-691: user language sensor for locale
* add new languageTags to list of languages {"af", "bn", "fi", "ha", "ig", "kk", "si", "sr", "tw"}
* refactor language setting
* add user language sensor

timeline.bodyText: Why are not all old tags in the new version? Were they renamed or is there another reason to delete these? "in", "iw"
timeline.author: juliajulie95

replies.bodyText:
'in' replaced by 'id' Bahasa Indonesia
'iw' replaced by 'he' עברית (Hebrew)
replies.author: ndrnour

replies.bodyText: Thank you for clearing that up!
replies.author: juliajulie95
